data.lyric:
[ti:Painting Pictures (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:Hall of Fame (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Painting Pictures (Explicit) - Polo G
[00:00.20]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett
[00:00.40]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett
[00:00.61]Holding back no
[00:07.37]
[00:12.68]Go without you
[00:15.51]
[00:16.25]I don't wanna be with you
[00:20.12]
[00:21.61]Uh uh
[00:22.72]Ayy 40 what that do
[00:23.79]Lil Wooski ain't your average teen he see the opps gon' bang it out
[00:26.96]He know exactly how to hit they block like that's his favorite route
[00:29.85]Ayy lil' n***a if you send some shots you better make it count
[00:33.07]RPs touch his brain cells rearrange his scalp
[00:35.49]They killed Lamp he took three with him they all know what your name about
[00:38.74]Ain't see you in so long it's like your voice is slowly fadin' out
[00:41.74]Love my n***as right or wrong no I would never trade 'em out
[00:44.46]Ain't thuggin' 'cause he mean it these lil' n***as in a race for clout
[00:47.70]Block died we threw up X's TimTim died we threw up T's
[00:50.76]Twin 'nem died we bangin' L's I wish that they ain't never leave
[00:53.59]For Killer K's to the brain I'm scorin' if I catch the G's
[00:56.52]Forever stuntin' like I'm Durb I keep a few tricks up my sleeve
[01:00.72]God I know I'm nothin' like them
[01:02.56]
[01:03.47]I'm just different I'm built different
[01:05.32]
[01:06.32]I feel as if we all got a purpose and we all special in some way
[01:10.34]
[01:11.99]But me my potential is unmatched
[01:14.54]
[01:15.72]I'm the chosen one
[01:16.90]
[01:18.09]But only time'll tell long live the guys
[01:21.73]Uh
[01:23.16]Say f**k the opposites but deep down we really all alike
[01:26.24]Since the elementary our elders gave us small advice
[01:29.08]This s**t could lead to death and jail it's crazy how they all was right
[01:32.08]I was playin' AAU with Ed it was ball is life
[01:35.01]Wish I could've warned him in advance 'fore he lost his life
[01:38.02]Game time call troopers for backup before we call for Christ
[01:40.66]Was real to him whole time while he sharpened his knife
[01:43.56]He put it in my back for racks ain't know his heart had a price
[01:46.32]Everything done in the dark gon' come to light
[01:48.44]Tryna choose your thoughts over your feelings that's the hardest fight
[01:51.61]Had to prove 'em wrong they said my dreams was out of sight
[01:54.81]Now it's 50K up in my jeans on chartered flights
[01:57.53]And we rock the hardest ice
[01:58.89]Holding back no
[02:02.68]
[02:05.02]Go without you
[02:06.79]I don't wanna be with you yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Painting Pictures (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:Hall of Fame (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.20]//
[00:00.40]//
[00:00.61]胆怯退缩
[00:07.37]
[00:12.68]抛下你独自前行
[00:15.51]
[00:16.25]我不想与你在一起
[00:20.12]
[00:21.61]//
[00:22.72]1040制作
[00:23.79]Lil Wooski不是你那种普通少年 他看见敌人就会扣下扳机
[00:26.96]他清楚地知道如何袭击他们的街区 好像这是他最喜欢的路线
[00:29.85]小兄弟 如果你想开几枪 你必须精确计算
[00:33.07]击中他的脑细胞 把他打得头破血流
[00:35.49]他们杀了Lamp 他带走了三个人 他们都知道你的名号
[00:38.74]很久没有见到你 就好像你的声音慢慢消逝
[00:41.74]无论是非对错 我爱着我的兄弟 我永远不会把他们当做交换的筹码
[00:44.46]不会胡作非为 因为他是认真的 这些小兄弟为了名声竞相角逐
[00:47.70]Block离开人世 我们摆出X的手势 TimTim离开人世 我们摆出T的手势
[00:50.76]那对双胞胎朋友离开人世 我们亮出帮派手势 我希望他们永远不会离开
[00:53.59]对杀手来说 大杀四方的天职 如果我遇上死对头 我会进行复仇
[00:56.52]永远耀武扬威 好像我就是Durb 我自有妙计
[01:00.72]上帝 我知道我一点也不像他们
[01:02.56]
[01:03.47]我只是与众不同 我生来就与众不同
[01:05.32]
[01:06.32]我感觉好像我们都拥有一个目标 在某种程度上 我们都会变得特别
[01:10.34]
[01:11.99]但是我的潜力是无与伦比的
[01:14.54]
[01:15.72]我是天选之子
[01:16.90]
[01:18.09]但是时间会证明一切
[01:21.73]//
[01:23.16]说着去他的针锋相对 但是在内心深处 我们都是一样的
[01:26.24]从读小学开始 我们的长辈给予我们小小的建议
[01:29.08]这一切会招致死亡和监禁的后果 他们竟然一语中的 真是不可思议
[01:32.08]我和Ed在业余体育联盟里打球 篮球就是人生
[01:35.01]真希望我能够在他失去性命前给他提醒
[01:38.02]游戏时间 在我们呼唤基督之前请求骑警的支援
[01:40.66]当他磨刀时 对他来说 所有时间都是真实的吗
[01:43.56]他为了钞票对我委以重任 并不知道他的心是有价的
[01:46.32]暗中所做的一切终将会真相大白
[01:48.44]试着选择你的思想而不是你的感受 这是最艰难的抗争
[01:51.61]必须证明他们都大错特错 他们说我的梦想是虚无缥缈的
[01:54.81]现在 我牛仔裤里装着五万块 全部花在包机航班上
[01:57.53]我们戴着最耀眼的钻石
[01:58.89]胆怯退缩
[02:02.68]
[02:05.02]抛下你独自前行
[02:06.79]我不想与你在一起
